pages.text: One of the core sects of Witchcraft is that of Circle Magic. By drawing circles of certain sizes and colours, as well as offering certain reagents, a witch can do nearly anything, from changing time, to summoning entities, and more.
The first form of chalk, both used on its own and as a base for the other chalks.
The heart of any circle ritual.
Used for rituals of a more diabolic nature.
Used for rituals that require communication with other dimensions or across large areas.

pages.name: Small Glyph Setup
pages.text: The outer glyphs can be any type except gold

pages.name: Medium Glyph Setup
pages.text: The outer glyphs can be any type except gold

pages.name: Large Glyph Setup
pages.text: The outer glyphs can be any type except gold

pages.title: Lesser Marks
pages.text: Instantly draws a small circle according to the chalk type held in the off-hand

pages.title: Marks
pages.text: Instantly draws a medium circle according to the chalk type held in the off-hand

pages.title: Greater Marks
pages.text: Instantly draws a large circle according to the chalk type held in the off-hand

pages.title: Solar Glory
pages.text: Turns it to day. Only works at night

pages.title: High Moon
pages.text: Turns it to night. Only works during the day

pages.title: Sands of Time
pages.text: Manipulates time to speed up the daylight cycle

pages.title: Deluge
pages.text: Causes a downpour

pages.title: Rite of the Open Way
pages.text: Teleports every entity in a small radius around the center glyph to either the Waystone's or entity's location, depending on the item used. This will only work if the target is in the same dimension

pages.title: Perception
pages.text: Causes entities nearby to glow

pages.title: Hungry Flames
pages.text: Summons flames from below to cook and smelt any items in the circle, but some items may be burned to XP

pages.title: Frenzied Growth
pages.text: Charges vanilla trees with magic to mutate them into their more witchy counterpart

pages.title: Revealing
pages.text: Fills lanterns with a magical light

pages.title: Call of the Wild
pages.text: Summon forth several animals from the wilds

pages.title: Conjure Witch
pages.text: Summons a fellow practitioner. However they may not always be happy you did soâ€¦

pages.title: Spiritual Rift
pages.text: Makes a temporary tear in the veil, allowings beings of a spiritual nature to walk the Earth once more. Only works at night

pages.title: Purification
pages.text: Blesses dirt into a version that smites undead beings

pages.title: Rising Twigs
pages.text: Transforms a mundane broom into its magical equivalent, Cypress in this case. Brooms, including the mundane one, can also be used to sweep up various dusts.

pages.title: Rising Twigs
pages.text: Transforms a mundane broom into its magical equivalent, Elder in this case. Brooms, including the mundane one, can also be used to sweep up various dusts.

pages.title: Rising Twigs
pages.text: Transforms a mundane broom into its magical equivalent, Juniper in this case. Brooms, including the mundane one, can also be used to sweep up various dusts.

pages.title: Rising Twigs
pages.text: Transforms a mundane broom into its magical equivalent, Yew in this case. Brooms, including the mundane one, can also be used to sweep up various dusts.
